pendingApprovalMessage: Your request has been sent to the administrator.
pendingApprovalNotify: You will be notified when your request is approved.
googleLoginFailed: Google login failed. Please try again.
pleaseEnterEmailPassword: Please enter both email and password

pleaseEnterEmailAddressFirst: Please enter your email address first
noAccountFoundWithThisEmail: No account found with this email address

catchUpOnFamilyNews: Catch up on family news and memories
stayConnected: Stay connected with your family through shared memories, important links, and beautiful photo albums.
name: Name
startYourBlogDesc: Make your blog visible to family members.
photoFeedTapHint: Tap the photo to enter full-screen view.
avatarRequirements: PNG, JPG, or WEBP up to 4 MB.

createYourFamilySite: Create your family site and enjoy:
unexpectedError: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened.
contactThankYou: Thank you for contacting us! We will get back to you shortly.
getInTouch: Have a question or idea? Get in touch

checkInboxContactAdmin: Check your inbox and contact the admin
requestSentButNoVerification: Request sent but we couldn't send a verification email
momSharedNewFamilyRecipe: Mom shared a new family recipe
connectYourGeniAccount: Connect your Geni account to fetch your profile.
inviteLinkDescription: Generate a 24-hour invite link to share with your family.
inviteLinkCreateError: Failed to create invite link. Please try again.
inviteLinkCopyError: Failed to copy invite link. Please copy it manually.
inviteLoadFailed: Failed to load invite. Please try again.
inviteAlreadyMemberMessage: You already have access to this family space.
inviteExpiredMessage: This invite link has expired. Please ask the admin for a new link.
inviteUsedMessage: This invite link has been used before, but you can still join with it.
inviteRevokedMessage: This invite link is no longer valid.
inviteNotFoundMessage: We couldn't find this invite link.
inviteErrorMessage: We couldn't process this invite right now. Please try again later.
inviteWelcomeMessage: Accept the invite to become part of the family space.
inviteAcceptFailed: Failed to accept invite. Please try again.
inviteCheckEmailDescription: We sent you a confirmation link to finish joining.
inviteCheckEmailHint: Click the link in the message to complete your membership.
inviteVerifyMissingToken: Missing verification token. Please use the link from your email.
inviteVerificationSuccessMessage: Redirecting you to the family dashboard…
inviteVerificationFailed: We couldn’t verify your invitation. Please request a new link.
inviteAlreadyVerified: This invite was already confirmed. You can go back to the dashboard or ask for a fresh link if needed.
credentialSetupSubtitle: Pick an option below so you can access your family space anytime.
credentialSetupPasswordDescription: Set a secure password for signing in directly with your email.
credentialSetupPasswordHint: Use at least 8 characters. We recommend mixing letters, numbers, and symbols.
credentialSetupPasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
credentialSetupPasswordFailed: We couldn't save that password. Please try again.
credentialSetupGoogleDescription: Link your Google account so you can sign in with one tap.
